com.mongodb

Class ReadConcern

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mongodb.ReadConcern

  • public final class ReadConcern
extends Object
    A read concern allows clients to choose a level of isolation for their reads.
    Since:
    3.2
    MongoDB documentation
    Read Concern
    Since server release
